priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire AUDIT-SR Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C119060

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire AUDIT-SR Test Code Terminology

definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version test code.
name: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire AUDIT-SR Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Have Alcohol Drink

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Many Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day
synonyms: ADT01-Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Have Six or More Drinks
synonyms: ADT01-Six or More Drinks One Occasion

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Last Year You Found Not Able to Stop Drinking
synonyms: ADT01-Not Able Stop Drinking Once Start

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Last Year You Failed to Do Normally Expected of You

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Last Year Need a Drink in the Morning to Get Going

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Last Year You Feel Guilt or Remorse After Drinking

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because of your drinking?
terms.preferredTerm: AUDIT - How Often Last Year You Unable to Remember What Happened the Night Before

terms.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?
Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - Has a relative, friend, doctor, or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test: Self-Report Version - Total.
